activation.en: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.

effect.en:
When a Level 10 monster with ? ATK is Normal Summoned to your field, each player can draw until they have 6 cards in their hand. Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can activate 1 of these Skills:
● Reveal 1 "Slifer the Sky Dragon" in your hand, place it on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 1 card.
● Once per Duel, discard 1 card, then add 1 "Slifer the Sky Dragon" from your Deck to your hand.
